name: paypal-customer-support-agent
description: PayPal Customer Support Agent - Full Stack Application

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix backend" "npm run dev --prefix frontend" "npm run dev --prefix mcp-server"
scripts.start: concurrently "npm start --prefix backend" "npm run dev --prefix frontend" "npm start --prefix mcp-server"
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix frontend && npm install --prefix mcp-server
scripts.test: echo "Running tests for all services..." && npm test --prefix backend && npm test --prefix mcp-server
